original_text: In those places you will hear happy songs, as people thank God. People will laugh aloud because they are so happy. I will make them grow in number. Their descendants will be many. I will cause other nations to give them honour. They will no longer insult my people. In those places you will hear happy songs, as people thank God. People will laugh aloud because they are so happy. I will make them grow in number. Their descendants will be many. I will cause other nations to give them honour. They will no longer insult my people. In those places you will hear happy songs,
korean_text: 그들에게서 감사하는 소리가 나오고 즐거워하는 자들의 소리가 나오리라 내가 그들을 번성하게 하리니 그들의 수가 줄어들지 아니하겠고 내가 그들을 존귀하게 하리니 그들은 비천하여지지 아니하리라

sentences.original_text: In those places you will hear happy songs
sentences.korean_translation: 그곳에서 너는 즐거운 노래를 듣게 될 것이다

sentences.original_text: I will make them grow in number
I will cause other nations to give them honour
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 다른 나라들이 그들에게 존경을 주게 하겠다

sentences.original_text: They will no longer insult my people
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 더 이상 내 백성을 모욕하지 않을 것이다

sentences.original_text: In those places you will hear happy songs
sentences.korean_translation: 그곳에서 너는 즐거운 노래를 듣게 될 것이다

sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 더 이상 내 백성을 모욕하지 않을 것이다

sentences.korean_translation: 그곳에서 너는 즐거운 노래를 듣게 될 것이다
